SETUP_WIZARD.DESC: A chat bot, free your hands make your streams simply

BUTTONS.COULD_NOT_AUTOSELECT: We couldn't auto select a board but don't worry, you have boards saved! Click the dropdown above and select a board.
BUTTONS.NAME: Name

LIVE_EVENTS.COULD_NOT_AUTOSELECT: We could not auto select a live event group. Click the dropdown and select one!
LIVE_EVENTS.NAME: Name

RUNNING_NOT_CONNECTED: Ready, but nothing is connected at this time.

CHATFEED.DISABLEDMESSAGE: The chat feed will accessable when Twitchbot is start.

DISABLE_AUTO_STAT_ACCRUAL.TEXT: Don't allow on active user lists
DISABLE_AUTO_STAT_ACCRUAL.TOOLTIP: Prevent the user from showing up in active user lists, such as the $randomActiveViewer variable.

DISABLE_ACTIVE_USER_LIST.TOOLTIP: Prevent this user from getting currency payouts, view time hours, and other stats automatically incremented. You will still be able to manually edit these values.

SETTING.HIDE_DELETED_MESSAGES_DESC: Turning this on will cover deleted messages with a blackbox. Hovering over the message will reveal it. Great for letting your mods hide spoilers!

ACHIEVEMENT.DESC1: You can view the streaming achievement data of the past eight weeks to get the daily live effect.
ACHIEVEMENT.DESC2: PS: If you don't live or open Twitchbot on one day, the data of that day will not be recorded.

HOVER.OLDVIEWERS: Viewers who have been to the live room before.
HOVER.NEWVIEWERS: Viewers who have never been to the live room before.

TOP_CHART.DESC: The top chart shows the most active users and the most frequent messages and emotes.

TIMES.NAME: Times
TIMES.HOVER: Ignore repeat emotes in the same message

POLL.DESC: You can run polls from your Twitchbot to increase engagement in your chat room, and can run mulitple at one time, each with their own unique setting.

BODY.NAME: Name
BODY.NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Set the name on poll. (* required)
BODY.NAME_TOOLTIP: Question displayed for the poll. (Maximum: 60 characters)
BODY.DURATION_TOOLTIP: Total duration for the poll (in seconds). (Minimum: 15. Maximum: 1800)
BODY.BITS_PER_VOTE_TOOLTIP: Number of Bits required to vote once with Bits.Minimum: 0. Maximum: 10000.
BODY.CHANNEL_POINTS_PER_VOTE_TOOLTIP: Number of Channel Points required to vote once with Channel Points.Minimum: 0. Maximum: 1000000.

NG_TOAST.POLL_TITLE_NAME_TOAST: Please provide a name for the Poll.
NG_TOAST.POLL_TITLE_NAME_LENGTH_TOAST: The maximum character length of the title cannot exceed 60.
NG_TOAST.POLL_CHOICES_OPTION_LENGTH_TOAST: Poll must have more then one option.
NG_TOAST.POLL_CHOICES_VALUE_LENGTH_TOAST: The maximum character length of the option cannot exceed 25.
NG_TOAST.POLL_BITS_PER_VOTE_TOAST: The number of bits must be between 0 and 10000.
NG_TOAST.POLL_CHANNEL_POINTS_PER_VOTE_TOAST: The number of channel points must be between 0 and 1000000.
NG_TOAST.POLL_DURATION_TIME_TOAST: The voting duration must be between 15 seconds and 1800 seconds.
NG_TOAST.POLL_RESULT_403_TOAST: You are not an affiliate or Twitch partner and not available to start a poll
NG_TOAST.POLL_RESULT_401_TOAST: you dont have the permission to start a poll
NG_TOAST.POLL_RESULT_NOT_START: This poll is not started after you edited or created, so you can't view the result.

CONFIRMMODAL.TITLE: DELETE POLL
CONFIRMMODAL.QUESTION: Do you want to delete this poll?

CHAT_NOTIFICATIONS.DESC: Send a notifiaction chat whenever some important activities happen.

ACTIVE_DESC.FOLLOWERS: A random thank you message will be sent to your new followers
ACTIVE_DESC.SUBSCRIBER: Post an randomly message in chat whenever someone subscribes to the channel
ACTIVE_DESC.GIFT_SUBSCRIPTION: Post an message in chat whenever someone gift subscription
ACTIVE_DESC.CHEER: Post a message in chat whenever someone cheers
ACTIVE_DESC.HOST: Post a message in chat when someone host your channel
ACTIVE_DESC.RAID: Post a message in chat when someone raids this channel
ACTIVE_DESC.ANNOUCEMENT: Make an announcement in the channel when you start to live

TIMERS.DESC: You can use timers to post messages to your chat automatically. A timer will only be active while your chat is active, and will skip any that are unavailable.

BODY.NAME: Name
BODY.NAME_TOOLTIP: This is your timer name. It has no significance but to remind you whatÂ this timer does.
BODY.MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: This is your timer response. You can use command variables to make dynamic responses.
BODY.COOLDOWNS_TOOLTIP: This is interval at which the timer repeats. Times are exact per hour (for example: 15 minutes is at 2:00,2:15,2:30,2:45, etc).
BODY.REQUIRED_CHAT_LINES_TOOLTIP: This is minimum amount of chat lines (measured in lines per  minutes) required to active the timer. If your chat is moving slow, this is useful to pervent Nightbot from spamming your empty channel.

CONFIRMMODAL.TITLE: DELETE TIMER
CONFIRMMODAL.QUESTION: Do you want to delete this timer?

AUTOREPLY.DESC: You can set some keywords and related reply, when audiences trigger the keywords which they settled before in the chat room, the audience will recieve the specific reply.

BODY.TRIGGER_TOOLTIP: The text at the beginning of a chat message that should trigger this command. Usually starts with a special character such as !
BODY.COOLDOWNS_TOOLTIP: Cooldowns prevent your commands from being spammed. You can apply a cooldown globally and even per user.
BODY.RESPONSE_TEXT_TOOLTIP: This is what Twitchbot should say in response when this command is triggered.

CONFIRMMODAL.TITLE: Delete Command
CONFIRMMODAL.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete the command

MESSAGEFILTER.DESC: Twitchbot can auto-removing spam and undesirable comments in your chat. When your Twitchbot puts a user in a timeout, it only removes them temporarily.

REPETITIONS.TOOLTIP: Remove messages containing repeated letters, phrases or words,or other disruptive behavior.

EMOTES.TOOLTIP: Remove message containing an excessive amount of emotes.

EXCESS_CAPS.TOOLTIP: This filter allows you to timeout users who use excessive capital letters in messages.

SYMBOLS.TOOLTIP: Remove messages containing disruptive or excessive use of symbols.

BLACKLISTEDWORDS.DESC: By blacklisting certain words and phrases, you can remove specific unwanted behavior from your chat.
BLACKLISTEDWORDS.PHRASE_TOOLTIP: The text must be between 1 and 500 characters.
BLACKLISTEDWORDS.TIME_OUT_TOOLTIP: Once Twitchbot detects a blacklisted phrase in a user's chat message,it removes their message from chat, and then puts the user in a chat timeout where they cannot send any more messages to Twitch chat until their timeout has expired.

CONFIRMMODAL.TITLE: Delete Command
CONFIRMMODAL.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete the command

EMOTE.DESC_NO_CONNECT: The Emote will accessable when Twitchbot is connected.
